name: D3.js Gallery Templates
description: Template configurations based on the Observable D3 Gallery. Each category file contains configs specifying chart type, D3 modules, data shape, scales, and key patterns needed to reproduce each visualization.

config_schema.name: Display name matching Observable gallery
config_schema.description: What the visualization shows and how
config_schema.interactive: Whether the visualization responds to user input
config_schema.data_shape: Description of expected input data structure
config_schema.data_fields: Object mapping field names to types
config_schema.scales: Object mapping visual channels to D3 scale types
config_schema.layout: Object with margin, dimensions, and layout hints
config_schema.key_patterns: Array of key D3 methods and patterns used
config_schema.notes: Implementation tips specific to this chart type
